name: Lux Noctis - The Light in the Night
name_original: Lux Noctis - The Light in the Night
description:
Lux Noctis is my entry to the Brackeys 2022.1 Game Jam! Lux Noctis (the Light in the Night) is a puzzle platformer containing 5 playable levels (for now...)

A young boy awakens in a dark room. In the shadows he is sure that he sees movement. Turn on all of the lights to show him that his imagined ghost are not real to move to the next room. 

I hope you enjoy this short experience in the darkness!
